elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  When I leave the Expedition zone — []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  When my Expedition moves forward — If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Target Character in Reserve gains 1 boost.
{R} []You may have target Character other than me lose [[Fleeting]] and gain 1 boost.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Boosted]] — []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Boosted]] — []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  When another Character joins my Expedition — If you control two or more [[Boosted]] Characters: Target Character in play or in Reserve other than me gains 1 boost.
{J} []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may have target Character other than me lose [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  {R} You may pay {1}. If you do: You may exhaust target card in Reserve.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  When my Expedition moves forward — You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  {R} If your Reserve is empty: Target Character gains 1 boost and [[Fleeting]].

{R} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: I gain 1 boost per [[Fleeting]] Character you control.  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.
{J} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: I gain 1 boost.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.
{R} []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  {R} If you control two or more [[Boosted]] Characters: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.

{H} []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  {R} You may pay {1}. If you do: Each Character in target Expedition gains 1 boost.
{J} []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  When I gain 1 or more boosts — If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: Target Character in play or in Reserve other than me gains 1 boost.
{J} []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  {R} If you control two or more [[Boosted]] Characters: [Sabotage], otherwise you may exhaust target card in Reserve.

{H} If you control two or more [[Boosted]] Characters: Target Character in Reserve gains 1 boost.  {R} []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  When I gain 1 or more boosts — If I'm [[Fleeting]]: You may exhaust target card in Reserve.
{H} []I gain 1 boost.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.
{R} []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.  {R} If you control two or more [[Boosted]] Characters: Target Character in Reserve gains 2 boosts.
